location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 19: Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: This letter concerns expenses incurred by Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, both during his visit to the Arabian coast and prior to his departure from Bushire. The list of charges follows on from the letter.
